Prerequisite: YSC3210 Introduction to Quantum Mechanics and YSC3224 Statistical Thermodynamics. Both courses are required (or permission of the instructor).
Corequisite: Prior on concurrent enrolment in YSC3213 Experimental Physics Laboratory
ModuleDescription: This advanced undergraduate course introduces students to some of the foundational concepts in condensed matter physics including the idea of crystals; two-dimensional lattices; space group symmetries; Electronic structure; Bloch’s theorem, Density of States, and simple models of the effects of interactions and disorder in realistic systems.
